question_text: A user is preparing to migrate from an old laptop HDD to a new SSD. What two steps must be completed before running cloning software?
answer_options: Check if the drive is encrypted
Install the SSD into the laptop
Connect the SSD externally if the laptop has only one bay
correct_answer: Check if the drive is encrypted
Connect the SSD externally if the laptop has only one bay
explanation: Encryption can interfere with cloning, and an external connection is often required when there’s no secondary bay.
